channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kremlin official says he's meeting Trump admin in first Russian visit to US since Ukraine war
item.description: Russia's special envoy on international economic and investment, Kirill Dmitriev, says he's in Washington meeting with the Trump administration.

item.title: A Faulty History of School Choice and Racism
item.description: What matters is whether school-choice programs have actually done any good. And they have.

item.title: Senate rebukes Trump's tariffs on Canada in bid to roll back presidential emergency powers

item.title: Exempting Most Americans From Taxes Is A Recipe For More Government Spending
item.description: Allowing most Americans to pawn off the full cost of federal programs on a small slice of the public would guarantee higher deficits.

item.title: The Fight Against The Censorship-Industrial Complex Is Not Over
item.description: Those who would keep the truth from U.S. citizens must be rooted out. We need a full accounting of what happened when transparency failed.

item.title: Markets nosedive as investors digest Trump tariff plan; Dow drops 1,200 points
item.description: Stocks on Wall Street plummeted Thursday as investors weighed President Trump's aggressive tariff plan and the potential risk of a global trade war.

item.title: Wokeness Is Just One Facet of U.S. Intel’s Flaws
item.description: Intelligence agencies need reform, but simply eliminating offices involved with DEI and declaring it a victory for efficiency would miss the point.

item.title: The ‘Anti-Trans’ Oxford Event That Wasn’t ‘Canceled’
item.description: People are increasingly willing to reject obvious falsehoods, and activists are decreasingly effective at intimidation.

item.title: Trump's DOGE push slashes millions in DEI contracts funding 'divisive ideologies' in blue states

item.title: 3 Ways China Could Strike Taiwan And What It Means For The U.S.
item.description: China’s got three ways to go at Taiwan: a patient choke, a lightning grab, or full chaos.

item.title: Trump gets rare Democrat support for new tariffs: 'This is a good start'
item.description: At least one House Democrat is showing some optimism for President Donald Trump's plan on tariffs.

item.title: Trump admin moves to more easily fire federal workers at 2 agencies: report
item.description: The White House is reportedly moving to reclassify federal workers at the Department of Energy and elsewhere in order to remove their job protections.

item.title: Smithsonian Exhibits Need Great Storytelling, Not More Politics
item.description: A Smithsonian exhibit on American entertainment eliminated country music from our nation's history. Trump’s executive order will change that.

item.title: 6 Lessons From A Once-Reluctant Backyard Chicken Farmer
item.description: Two years ago, I gave in to my wife’s passion for backyard eggs. Here’s what I’ve learned so far.

item.title: After Years of Woke Shows, MAGA Comes for the Smithsonian
item.description: Enforcing Trump’s EO on ‘Restoring Truth and Sanity to American History’ will take tough love, force, and deprogramming, and it won’t be pretty.
